name: UnSliced
description:
This project was made in 30h, during SyrenkaJam in January 2022.
We made it with a team of 3 people: Game Designer, Unity Developer and C# Programmer.

UnSliced is merely a concept of a possible game with a "reverse Fruit Ninja" theme. Where the vegetables/ fruits try to escape the knives, while trying to stay on the table.

Controls:
Movement: W,S,A,D / Arrows
